# Agroecology

<br>

*	Crop-pest-enemy tri-trophic interactions in the face of climate change: Will temperature warming exacerbate pest damage via alteration of morphological, physiological, and ecological traits of plants, herbivores, and predators?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Interactions among different guilds of predators and their impacts on pest control: Are the effects of various predator groups on pest populations additive, synergistic, or antagonistic?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	The role of alternative prey in enemy-pest dynamics: What is the optimal density of alternative prey for the greatest pest suppression?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Effects of surrounding landscapes and spatial subsidies on pest control: How farmland characteristics (e.g., farm edge-to-area ratios, hedgerow and surrounding vegetation) affect pest control and crop production?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Chemical ecology in agro-ecosystems: How can plant volatiles and predator odors be applied in the field to achieve better pest control?
